entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.4°C

Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 96 %

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Rain beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending late in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
